# Generated by "yarp cmake" & Juan G. Victores 2014

set(KEYWORD "GameStatesLib")

add_library(${KEYWORD} DeadState.hpp
                       DeadState.cpp
                       GameState.hpp
                       GameState.cpp
                       InitState.hpp
                       InitState.cpp)

target_include_directories(${KEYWORD} PUBLIC ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR})

target_link_libraries(${KEYWORD} PUBLIC UtilsLib
                                        StateMachineLib
                                        InputLib
                                        NetworkLib
                                        ImageLib
                                        MentalMapLib
                                        RobotLib
                                        MusicLib
                                        UserInterfaceLib)
